name: LA Monsters
storyline: LA monsters is the story of Josh and Sid two brothers that live in Rawal California they’re quite comfortable life is brought to an end by the excesses of the world around them a powerful brain altering TV signal takes over all TVs and monsters rule the world. The brothers have to journey through the LA wasteland in search of their lost parents. This is an interactive video novel Which allows the player to experience the story of LA monsters with cutting edge visuals sound and animations along with full narration and digital extras.
summary: Travel through the LA wasteland with Josh and Sid in this atmospheric interactive video novel.
